mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sms_coupon_history ( shop_id, coupon_id, member_id, member_nickname, create_time, use_status ) VALUES ( #{shopId}, #{couponId}, #{memberId}, #{memberNickname}, #{createTime}, #{useStatus} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sms_coupon_history SET use_status = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.NAME, c.platform, c.amount, c.start_time startTime, c.end_time endTime, c.use_type, cp.product_category_id productCategoryId, cp.product_category_name productCategoryName, cr.product_id productId, cr.product_name productName, s.name shopName FROM sms_coupon c LEFT JOIN sms_coupon_product_category_relation cp ON c.id = cp.coupon_id LEFT JOIN sms_coupon_product_relation cr ON cr.coupon_id = c.id LEFT JOIN ums_shop_information s ON s.id = c.shop_id WHERE c.member_level <= #{memberLevel} and c.publish_count = 1

SELECT c.id, c.NAME, c.platform, c.amount, c.start_time startTime, c.end_time endTime, c.use_type, cp.product_category_id productCategoryId, cp.product_category_name productCategoryName, cr.product_id productId, cr.product_name productName, ch.id couponHistoryId, ch.use_status useStatus, ch.order_id orderId, ch.order_sn orderSn, s.name shopName FROM sms_coupon_history ch JOIN sms_coupon c ON ch.coupon_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sms_coupon_product_category_relation cp ON c.id = cp.coupon_id LEFT JOIN sms_coupon_product_relation cr ON cr.coupon_id = c.id LEFT JOIN ums_shop_information s ON s.id = c.shop_id WHERE ch.member_id = #{id}

SELECT c.id, c.NAME, c.platform, c.amount, c.start_time startTime, c.end_time endTime, c.use_type, cp.product_category_id productCategoryId, cp.product_category_name productCategoryName, cr.product_id productId, cr.product_name productName, ch.id couponHistoryId, ch.use_status useStatus, ch.order_id orderId, ch.order_sn orderSn, s.name shopName FROM sms_coupon_history ch JOIN sms_coupon c ON ch.coupon_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sms_coupon_product_category_relation cp ON c.id = cp.coupon_id LEFT JOIN sms_coupon_product_relation cr ON cr.coupon_id = c.id LEFT JOIN ums_shop_information s ON s.id = c.shop_id WHERE ch.member_id = #{id} and ch.use_status = 0

SELECT c.id, c.NAME, c.platform, c.amount, c.start_time startTime, c.end_time endTime, c.use_type, cp.product_category_id productCategoryId, cp.product_category_name productCategoryName, cr.product_id productId, cr.product_name productName, ch.id couponHistoryId, ch.use_status useStatus, ch.order_id orderId, ch.order_sn orderSn, s.name shopName FROM sms_coupon_history ch JOIN sms_coupon c ON ch.coupon_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sms_coupon_product_category_relation cp ON c.id = cp.coupon_id LEFT JOIN sms_coupon_product_relation cr ON cr.coupon_id = c.id LEFT JOIN ums_shop_information s ON s.id = c.shop_id WHERE ch.member_id = #{id} and c.shop_id = #{shopId} and ch.use_status = 0 or ch.member_id = #{id} and c.use_type = 0 and ch.use_status = 0
SELECT shop_id FROM sms_coupon WHERE id = #{couponId} AND per_limit > ( SELECT count( id ) FROM sms_coupon_history WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND coupon_id = #{couponId} )
SELECT end_time FROM sms_coupon WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT count( ch.id ), c.min_point FROM sms_coupon_history ch JOIN sms_coupon c ON c.id = ch.coupon_id WHERE ch.id = #{id} AND ch.use_status = 0 AND c.min_point <= ${amount}

SELECT c.id, c.NAME, c.platform, c.amount, c.start_time startTime, c.end_time endTime, c.use_type, cp.product_category_id productCategoryId, cp.product_category_name productCategoryName, cr.product_id productId, cr.product_name productName, ch.id couponHistoryId, ch.use_status useStatus, ch.order_id orderId, ch.order_sn orderSn, s.name shopName FROM sms_coupon_history ch JOIN sms_coupon c ON ch.coupon_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sms_coupon_product_category_relation cp ON c.id = cp.coupon_id LEFT JOIN sms_coupon_product_relation cr ON cr.coupon_id = c.id LEFT JOIN ums_shop_information s ON s.id = c.shop_id WHERE ch.member_id = #{id} and ch.use_status <> 0
